org.apache.james.protocols.api.handler

Interface CommandHandler<Session extends ProtocolSession>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProtocolHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractApopCmdHandler, AbstractHookableCmdHandler, AbstractPassCmdHandler, AuthCmdHandler, CapaCmdHandler, DataCmdHandler, DeleCmdHandler, EhloCmdHandler, ExpnCmdHandler, HeloCmdHandler, HelpCmdHandler, LhloCmdHandler, ListCmdHandler, MailCmdHandler, NoopCmdHandler, NoopCmdHandler, QuitCmdHandler, QuitCmdHandler, RcptCmdHandler, RetrCmdHandler, RsetCmdHandler, RsetCmdHandler, StartTlsCmdHandler, StatCmdHandler, StlsCmdHandler, TopCmdHandler, UidlCmdHandler, UnknownCmdHandler, UnknownCmdHandler, UnknownCommandHandler, UserCmdHandler, VrfyCmdHandler

    public interface CommandHandler<Session extends ProtocolSession>
extends ProtocolHandler
    Custom command handlers must implement this interface The command handlers will be Server wide common to all the handlers, therefore the command handlers must store all the state information in the Session object

      Collection<String> getImplCommands()
      Return a Collection of implemented commands

      Handle the command
